hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOTLC.JOB_ID, EOTLC.EO_TEMPLATE_CODE, EOTLC.CREATOR, EOTLC.CREATE_TIME, EOTLC.MODIFIER, EOTLC.MODIFY_TIME, EOTLC.REC_STATUS, EOTLC.ORG_ID, EOTLC.TIME_ZONE, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_CODE, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_NAME, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_VALUE, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_TYPE, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_WIDTH, EOTLC.EO_SEQ_NO, EOTLC.REC_VER, EOTLC.ENABLED_FLAG, EOTLC.EO_IS_REQUIRE, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_PROPERTY, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_HEADER, EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_UNIQUE from EO_ORDER_TEMPLATE_LIST_COL EOTLC where 1 = 1 <<and EOTLC.JOB_ID = :jobId>> <<and EOTLC.EO_TEMPLATE_CODE = :eoOrderTemplateCode>> <<and EOTLC.CREATOR like :creator>> <<and EOTLC.CREATE_TIME like :createTime>> <<and EOTLC.MODIFIER=:modifier>> <<and EOTLC.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and EOTLC.REC_STATUS=:recStatus>> <<and EOTLC.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<and EOTLC.TIME_ZONE=:timeZone>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_CODE=:eoColumnCode>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_NAME=:eoColumnName>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_VALUE=:eoColumnValue>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_TYPE=:eoColumnType>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_WIDTH=:eoColumnWidth>> <<and EOTLC.EO_SEQ_NO=:eoSeqNo>> <<and EOTLC.REC_VER=:recVer>> <<and EOTLC.ENABLED_FLAG=:enabledFlag>> <<and EOTLC.EO_IS_REQUIRE=:eoIsRequire>> <<and EOTLC.EO_COLUMN_PROPERTY=:eoColumnProperty>> ORDER BY EOTLC.EO_SEQ_NO ASC
